text: today I'm going to show you what most
people want to do they want to write
happy birthday on the top of their
birthday cake a good way to practice is
to use a piece of parchment take a
little bit of frosting and put it in the
four corners of the sheet tray here is
it helps to secure the parchment I'm
going to start off with the small round
tip so using one hand to guide the other
one it should be pushing by an even
amount of pressure it does take a little
bit of practice but the great thing
about using parchment is that you can
scrape off whatever you've done and you
can always add it back into your
Batchelor crossing and keep practicing
until you get it down dot the eye
there's happy birthday and there you go
enjoy guys
you
